questions.question: What is the definition of resilience as presented in the module?
choices: The ability to avoid all challenges
The capacity to remain unchanged in difficult situations
The ability to recover quickly from difficulties
The skill of ignoring problems
questions.answer: The ability to recover quickly from difficulties

questions.question: Which of the following is NOT mentioned as a component of resilience?
choices: Mental toughness
Emotional regulation
Financial stability
Adaptability
questions.answer: Financial stability

questions.question: What historical event significantly tested Timorese resilience from 1975 to 1999?

Indonesian occupation

Japanese invasion
